title: I can not contain my disappointment.
body:
Its a rare occurrence that a Poro explodes _(although now it is much more possible thanks to the edition of a 2nd treat, (Thanks Riot, much appreciated!))_

and an even rarer occurrence to see a Poro afflicted with Braum's moustache explode.

I was lucky enough to witness such an event...

But the discovery we made, shook my faith in the world! _(almost as much as the day I found out that real Vikings didnt have horns on their hemets)_ I learned the dreadful truth that none of the baby Poros had moustaches....

I am saddened. Right to the core.

**Braum's moustache should be manly enough to penetrate right through the generations!**

{{champion:201}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
I find it sad, that when you explode a poro, people havent figured out their strategic value of having like 10 baby ones around. Nobody seems to understand you can herd the poro's in ARAM. 

That's correct... Herd them...

as in move them around the map as you see fit....


ever lined the side brush with poro's? ever wonder why the poro's suddenly run out from the brush?

that's riiiiight people... there's a champion moving behind the poro...

Poro's tell you where invisible champions are.
You have way too much time on you're hands.
Though really, after re-reading... I kinda think its lame you associate manliness with "penetration" in a game. He's not sleeping with a damn poro you know.

I find this both shocking and a needed fix!!!
{{summoner:30}} {{summoner:31}}
